topic.title: Exercise: solv005 - Production of dog food

section.p: There are two types of dog food for sale: ordinary and special. A bag ordinary food contains 3 units minerals, 2 units protein and 3 units fat. This bag costs $8. A bag special food contains 8 units minerals, 2 units protein and 1 unit fat. The price of this bag is $14. Over a period of time a dog should at least consumed 72 units minerals, 36 units protein and 36 units fat.
Determine the quantity of both bags to be bought with minimum costs.
